title: Localization key can't be blank when adding
description: Bug 101187Localization key can't be blank when adding. Description: If the key is left blank, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart.
OB: When the key in the properties file is left blank, the externalized text is not displayed in the chart title.
EB: The externalized text should be displayed in the chart title even if the key is blank.
SR: 1. Set an externalized text in the chart title. 2. Verify that the externalized text is displayed in the chart title even when the key is blank.
